title: Never too late
creator_credit: Australian Council for the Arts. Film and Television Board
brief_description: Discusses the history, scope and functioning of the Manly-Warringah School for Seniors at Dee Why, New South Wales. Emphasises the importance of providing companionship and mental stimulation for the older members of the community.
